title: PRICE DROP! Awesome 2 Bed Mt. Baker Unit!
posting_body: 3320 Claremont Ave S Unit 4 | Seattle, WA 98144-6801
Enjoy an alternative lifestyle with all the diversity and cultural richness that the south end of Seattle has to offer in this awesome two bedroom unit.
ft. unit boats 2 full bedrooms that are fully remodeled with designer touches!
You will love the granite counter tops, updated paint and recently finished dark oak floors.
Plus updated bathroom fixtures with contemporary concrete floors and programmable thermostats in every room to save energy and $$$!
Unreserved parking is available on property and street parking available!
No smoking and no pets (no exceptions), please.
*$49 non-refundable application fee per each applicant age 18 and older.
Key Words: Seattle, Mt Baker, North Beacon Hill, Rainier Vista, I-5, I-90, Lakeshore.
Walking distance to QFC - Safeway -Asian and ethnic grocery stores
15 minute walk to Rainier Square Plaza
15 Minute walk to Safeway-TMobile-Radio Shack - Taco Bell  - Magic Dragon
Less than 1 mile to Columbia City - 3 min by car or Metro Route #7
Walking distance to Mt. Baker Railway Station
Close to Light Rail to get to Downtown - Chinatown - Stadiums - Pioneer Sqaure - University District - Easy Access to Airport
